AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: torturer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] always took [PAWN_possessive] time while torturing [PAWN_possessive] victims. Not because [PAWN_pronoun] was bad at torturing, quite the opposite in fact. [PAWN_nameDef] just liked to see how much pain [PAWN_pronoun] could inflict until [PAWN_possessive] victim finally cracked.
